title: Ticket #1325: Add _SCHEDD_ADDRESS_FILE to DAGMan's env/config
description: (02:04:50 PM) proxymatt: i discovered that you should use a _SCHEDD_ADDRESS_FILE in condor_submit_dag's env, otherwise dagman->condor_submit hits the collector for each submission => SLOW
remarks:
2010-May-12 16:38:10 by wenger:
I just did a bunch of testing on this, and condor_submit (both inside and outside DAGMan) has a value for SCHEDD_ADDRESS_FILE without doing anything special: 

  05/12/10 16:30:34 From submit: DIAG Daemon::readAddressFile(SCHEDD)
  05/12/10 16:30:34 From submit: DIAG addr_file: </var/home/condor/log/.schedd_address>

Therefore, I'm going to resolve this ticket.

2010-May-12 16:42:43 by matt:
I don't have the chat log, but this was an issue when you have multiple schedds you can submit to and you need to pick one via SCHEDD_NAME.

2010-May-12 16:48:32 by wenger:
Okay, I didn't have the info about picking between different schedds. I guess I'll unresolve the ticket, but give it a low priority, because I think that's at least a somewhat unusual case.

2011-Mar-10 13:08:39 by matt:
Pushed a modification to condor_submit_dag for this and filed doc bug #1958. Please review.

2011-Aug-26 14:51:41 by wenger:
Okay, finally got around to reviewing this. It all looks okay, except that there is no version history entry for it. I guess it's too late to really worry about that...
